question.text:
Among the triatomic molecules/ions, BeCl2,N3-,N2O,NO2+,O3,SCI2,ICI2-,I3- and XeF2 , the total number of linear molecule(s)/ion(s) where the hybridization of the central atom does not have contribution from the d-orbital(s) is

[Atomic number : S=16, Cl=17, I= 53 and Xe=54 ]

solution.text: <math> <mrow>  <mfenced close="}" open="">   <mrow>    <mtable columnalign='left' equalrows='true' equalcolumns='true'>     <mtr columnalign='left'>      <mtd columnalign='left'>       <mrow>        <mtext>Cl</mtext><mo>−</mo><mtext>Be</mtext><mo>−</mo><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow>      </mtd>     </mtr>     <mtr columnalign='left'>      <mtd columnalign='left'>       <mrow>        <mover>         <mtext>N</mtext>         <mrow>          <mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow>        </mover>        <mo>=</mo><mover>         <mtext>N</mtext>         <mrow>          <mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow>        </mover>        <mo>=</mo><mover>         <mtext>N</mtext>         <mrow>          <mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow>        </mover>        </mrow>      </mtd>     </mtr>     <mtr columnalign='left'>      <mtd columnalign='left'>       <mrow>        <mtext>N</mtext><mo>≡</mo><mtext>Ν</mtext><mo>→</mo><mtext>O</mtext></mrow>      </mtd>     </mtr>     <mtr columnalign='left'>      <mtd columnalign='left'>       <mrow>        <mtext>O</mtext><mo>=</mo><mover>         <mtext>N</mtext>         <mo>+</mo>        </mover>        <mo>=</mo><mtext>O</mtext></mrow>      </mtd>     </mtr>         </mtable></mrow>  </mfenced><mtext>Linear </mtext><mfenced>   <mrow>    <mtext>sp hybridisation</mtext></mrow>  </mfenced></mrow></math>
